text: hidha alsharab aldhy mizaj min alkafur hu eayan yashrab minha eibad allaha, yatasarafun fiha, wyujrwnha hayth shawuu 'ijra'an suhla. huala' kanuu fi aldunya yufun bima 'uwjabuu ealaa 'anfusahum min taeat allaha, wayakhafun eiqab allah fi yawm alqiamat aldhy yakun dararah khtyrana, washarh fashyana mntshrana ealaa alnaasi, 'iilaa man rahim allaha, wyuteimwn altaeam mae habihim lah wahajatuhum 'iilayhi, fqyrana eajzana ean alkisab la yamlik min hutam aldunya shyyana, watifulana maat 'abuh wala mal laha, wasyrana 'usr fi alharb min almushrikin waghayrahima, wayaqulun fi 'anfusihima: 'iinama nuhsin 'iilaykum abtigha' mardat allaha, watalab thawabaha, la nabtaghi ewdana wala naqsud hmdana wala thna'an minkum.
